typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
empdata keyGenerate(output(keyId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		Id = keyId,
		EmpId = empid,
		EmpName = empName,
		Deptid,
		Age = age
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['surrogateKey.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Id,
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Deptid,
		Age
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
